---
name: 友链模板
about: 请根据指示规范填写友链格式。
---

<!-- 请在下方代码块的双引号中填写 -->
```json
{
    "title": "",
    "screenshot": "",
    "url": "",
    "avatar": "",
    "description": "",
    "keywords": ""
}
```

<!--
"title": "站点名称",
"screenshot": "站点预览图链接",
"url": "站点链接",
"avatar": "头像链接",
"description": "站点描述",
"keywords": "关键词，作为分组名"
-->

<!-- 示例 -->

<!--
"title": "洛屿的小站",
"screenshot": "https://www.drluo.top/img/link/www.drluo.top.webp",
"url": "https://www.drluo.top/",
"avatar": "https://cravatar.cn/avatar/6fa57e21db3ba5961f18a8ae75d0a081?s=200&r=g&d=retro",
"description": "嗨，靓仔，今天也要有个好心情哦！",
"keywords": "洛屿"
-->
